      • getEntryListOfModule

        public java.util.List<Entry> getEntryListOfModule(Module module)
        Loads all entries of a specified module.

        Gets a module and with his "moduleID" and his "module version" it gets the appropriate entries the module consists of. These are returned in the form of a Module.entryList.

        Parameters:
        module - The name of the Module.
        Returns:
        The entryList of the Module.
        See Also:
        Module, Entry, Course, CourseEntry, SelfStudy, TextualEntry

      • createModule

        public boolean createModule(Module module)
        Creates a new module in the database.

        A module consists of various parameters such as moduleID, version, name ... Furthermore, it consists of courses and their content. A study is made up of several modules.

        Parameters:
        module - the module which should be created
        Returns:
        true If a new module was created, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        Module
